publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3834 Shirley-Anne Somerville: The Age of Stupid Film—That the Parliament welcomes the successful screening of the film, The Age of Stupid, which has just come to the end of its run at the Filmhouse cinema in Edinburgh; notes the inspirational and sobering message of the film; hopes that this will encourage people to leave the cinema and take action against climate change; is pleased that the film has been granted permission to screen at the Cameo cinema in Edinburgh from 15 May 2009; supports the future success of the film, and notes that further information about the film including a trailer can be found at www.ageofstupid.net.
S3M-3834 The Age of Stupid Film (lodged on 30 March 2009) Alasdair Allan*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3834 The Age of Stupid Film (lodged on 30 March 2009) Trish Godman*

S3M-3834 Shirley-Anne Somerville: The Age of Stupid Film—That the Parliament welcomes the successful screening of the film, The Age of Stupid, which has just come to the end of its run at the Filmhouse cinema in Edinburgh; notes the inspirational and sobering message of the film; hopes that this will encourage people to leave the cinema and take action against climate change; is pleased that the film has been granted permission to screen at the Cameo cinema in Edinburgh from 15 May 2009; supports the future success of the film, and notes that further information about the film including a trailer can be found at www.ageofstupid.net. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Robin Harper, Bill Kidd, Jamie Hepburn, Trish Godman, Dave Thompson*
S3M-3834 The Age of Stupid Film (lodged on 30 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3834 The Age of Stupid Film (lodged on 30 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
